Class BaseThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • OAT.event.Listenable
      • OAT.trading.Plugin
        • OAT.trading.thread.BaseThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Loggable, PrefNode<Plugin>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BacktestThread, DataThread, HistDataCollector, MainThread

extends Plugin
implements java.lang.Runnable
